Packages 
Package Description
com.mssrchapelier.TigreParser
The main package containing two public classes: TigreParser, the main class of the application performing morphological analysis on Tigre words, text fragments and text files; TigreParserCliLauncher, a command-line interface for TigreParser.
com.mssrchapelier.TigreParser.components
Contains various internal components used by classes in TigreParser.
com.mssrchapelier.TigreParser.components.utils
Contains components used throughout the application, by classes in TigreParser and VerbProcessor.
com.mssrchapelier.TigreParser.components.utils.misc
Contains two classes used throughout the application: ConfigParseException, which is thrown to indicate that a component has failed to parse some part of a configuration file (indicating that it is malformed); LetterType, a static class used to determine the type of the phoneme (vowel, consonant, semivowel, laryngeal and some others) represented by the (transliterated) char passed to one of its methods as an argument.
com.mssrchapelier.TigreParser.components.utils.word
Contains the internal representations of word objects and their components used throughout the application.
com.mssrchapelier.TigreParser.components.VerbProcessor
Contains the VerbProcessor class, the application's component processing finite verb forms, and the subpackages that it relies on: Paradigm, whose class Paradigm reads finite verb paradigms from the paradigm configuration file and stores its internal representation as a mapping (namely a LinkedHashMap) of unique StemDescription objects (see below) to ArrayLists of ParadigmCell objects; StemDescription, with StemDescription instances representing a combination of the number of consonants in the root (NumRadicals), the root type per Raz 19831 (RootType) and the stem's derivational prefix (DerivPrefix; verb preformative in Raz 1983); Stem, storing representations of actual verb roots (the Root class) and stems (the Stem class); also contains RootListGenerator which generates a list of possible verb roots given a (transliterated and geminated) String.
com.mssrchapelier.TigreParser.components.VerbProcessor.Paradigm  
com.mssrchapelier.TigreParser.components.VerbProcessor.Paradigm.GrammemeSet  
com.mssrchapelier.TigreParser.components.VerbProcessor.Stem  
com.mssrchapelier.TigreParser.components.VerbProcessor.StemDescription
